text.name: systemDesc
text.text: The APF Microcomputer System is a second generation 8-bit cartridge-based home video game console released in October 1978 by APF Electronics Inc. with six cartridges. The console is often referred to M-1000 or MP-1000, which are the two model numbers of the console. The APF-MP1000 comes built-in with the game Rocket Patrol. The APF-MP1000 is a part of the APF Imagination Machine. It is the successor to the APF TV Fun line of first generation consoles.

A menudo se hace referencia a la consola como M-1000 o MP-1000, que son los dos números de modelo de la consola. La APF-MP1000 viene incorporada con el juego Rocket Patrol. La APF-MP1000 forma parte de la APF Imagination Machine. Es la sucesora de la línea APF TV Fun de consolas de primera generación.
